termsInfo:
1. Introduction
Please read all information carefully.

1.1 Mobile-TAG is an application designed to simplify and streamline the collection of information in the event of vehicle incidents. One of the biggest advantages of Mobile-TAG is that it eliminates language barriers.
Mobile-TAG enables drivers to complete reports in their own language instead of the official language of the country where their vehicle is registered. Mobile-TAG-AUTO handles all translations automatically.

2. Advantages of using Mobile-TAG:
2.1 Independent use – Mobile-TAG is a standalone application that can be used by any driver.
2.2 Multilingual support – The application supports multiple languages ​​and adapts automatically if the selected language is available, the user can read the questions in their own language but the report is created in the official language of the vehicle.
2.3 Automated documentation – Automatically creates a read-only PDF report with all necessary information.
2.4 Quick sharing – The report can be easily sent to other parties and insurance companies via e-mail.
2.5 Clear structure – Each driver gets his own page in the report, making it clear who reported what.
2.6 User friendly – ​​The app guides you step by step and ensures that important information is collected.

3. How Mobile-TAG works:
3.1 Language support – The app handles automatic translations, so the driver receives the report in the vehicle's registration language.
3.2 Report generation – In the event of an incident, the user fills in the information, and Mobile-TAG creates a PDF report.
3.3 Secure sharing – The report is read-only and can be sent directly to the parties via email if email addresses are provided.

4. Important recommendations:
4.1 Follow local laws – In the event of serious accidents with personal injuries or when the vehicle cannot be driven on, emergency services and roadside assistance must be contacted according to local regulations.
4.2 Safety measures - Ensure that everyone involved is safe and that other road users are warned in a safe way.
5. User responsibility:

5.1 Truthfulness - You are responsible for providing accurate and truthful information in the report.
5.2 Document storage – You are responsible for keeping the PDF report secure and protecting it from unauthorized access.
5.3 Legal Penalties – Providing false information may lead to legal action by affected parties, including insurance companies.

6. Language support:
6.1 Mobile-TAG supports multiple languages, making it easy for drivers from different countries to use the app. The report can be generated in the official language of the country where the vehicle is registered.
The language translations are handled by machine translation.
6.2 Available languages ​​include but are not limited to –
Arabic, Bulgarian, Bosnian, Czech, German, Danish, French, English, Dutch, Greek, Italian, Irish, Norwegian, Mongolian, Malay, Kazakh, Hindi, Urdu, Persian, Serbian, Slovenian, Slovak, Turkish, Portuguese(Brazil) , Polish, Russian, Finnish, Ukrainian, Luxembourgish, Hungarian, Swedish, Romanian, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Indonesian, Uzbek, Somali, Spanish and Vietnamese.
This means that the document can be created in these languages ​​and that they are also available for machine translation and users can report incorrect translations to improve future versions.

7. Data protection and security:
7.1 Encryption – Personal data is encrypted and stored securely in accordance with data protection regulations.
7.2 TLS protection – All data sent to the server, for example when drivers are connected in a joint report, is encrypted via TLS.
7.4 Privacy – All data is stored locally on the device and is only shared when the user chooses to send the report. No data is stored on Mobile-TAG's server, and no third party has access to the communication.

8. Purpose:
8.1 Mobile-TAG is developed to streamline and simplify claims handling. The app guides the user step by step, eliminates language barriers and generates a professional, read-only report. The report can be used as a basis for contact with insurance companies or other parties involved.

9. Disclaimer:
9.1 Mobile-TAG is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. The developer does not guarantee that the app will function without errors or be available at all times. The user agrees to use the app at his own risk. The developer cannot be held responsible for technical problems, interruptions or errors in the functionality of the app.

10. Limitation of Liability:
10.1 The developer is not responsible for direct, indirect, special, incidental or consequential damages, including but not limited to loss of data, financial losses, or damages arising from the use of Mobile-TAG. This applies even if the developer has been informed of the possibility of such damages.

11. Responsibilities of the user:
11.1 Mobile-TAG is a tool to facilitate information gathering in the event of vehicle incidents. It is the user's responsibility to take the necessary measures in accordance with local laws, including contacting emergency services in the event of serious accidents. The user is also responsible for ensuring that all information is correct and truthful. Knowingly providing false information may lead to legal action.

12. Manage PDF reports:
12.1 The User is responsible for ensuring the security of PDF reports generated by the App. The developer is not responsible for loss of reports if the user loses their device, loses access to their email or otherwise loses access to the document. The user recommends saving a copy of the report in a safe place.

13. Machine translations:
13.1 Machine translations may contain errors, and the developer is not responsible for any inaccuracies in the translations. The PDF report shows that machine translation has been used, and the user's original texts are included in the report.
13.1 Mobile-TAG uses machine translation both inside the app and in the generated PDF report. Machine translations may contain errors or inaccuracies. The developer is not responsible for misunderstandings, incorrect interpretations, or decisions made based on translated text. The original text provided by the user is always included in the PDF for reference.

14. Legal Status of the Report
14.1 Mobile-TAG is not an official claims document, legal record, or insurance form. It is a tool designed to assist drivers in gathering and exchanging information after a vehicle incident. Insurance companies or authorities may require additional or separate documentation.
14.2 The developer is not a party to any dispute arising from the incident, the report, or communication between involved drivers, insurance companies, or third parties.
14.3 Mobile-TAG does not verify the identity of users, the accuracy of the information entered, or the correctness of machine translations. All information is provided voluntarily by the user, who assumes full responsibility for its accuracy.
14.4 Mobile-TAG is intended solely as a tool for quick and efficient information exchange between drivers in situations involving minor vehicle damage, such as scratches, dents, or other non-critical incidents. The application is not intended for use in emergencies or situations requiring police, medical assistance, or fire and rescue services. In such cases, the user must contact the appropriate authorities immediately in accordance with local laws and regulations.

15. Governing Law
These Terms of Use shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Sweden, without regard to its conflict of law principles. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with the use of Mobile-TAG or these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Swedish courts.
privacyInfo:
Privacy Policy

Mobile-TAG respects user privacy and is designed to minimize the collection and handling of personal data.

Advertising in the App:
The Mobile-TAG app displays advertisements using Google AdMob. The app uses non-personalized ads only. This means that ads are shown without using personal identifiers for ad personalization.

Google AdMob may process limited device-related information (such as device type or regional settings) in order to deliver ads, in accordance with Google’s own privacy policies. Mobile-TAG does not collect, store, or process personal data such as names, email addresses, or contact details.

Consent and Ad Controls:
In regions where consent is required by law, Google handles consent management directly through its own mechanisms. The app includes a settings option that allows users to review or update their ad preferences where applicable. This functionality is provided and managed by Google.

Users can also manage or reset their device’s advertising settings at any time through the applications terms section.

Data Sharing:
Mobile-TAG does not share user data with third parties. Any data related to advertising is handled solely by Google and its advertising services in accordance with Google’s privacy policies.

Website and Cookies:

The official Mobile-TAG website uses Google AdSense to display advertisements. At this time, the website is configured to show non-personalized ads only.

Google may use cookies or similar technologies for ad delivery in accordance with applicable laws. Mobile-TAG does not collect, store, or process personal data on its own servers.

Information about how Google handles advertising data can be found here:
https://policies.google.com/technologies/ads

Changes:
This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. Any changes will be made available within the app or on the official website.

QR Code Generation:
When generating a QR code, certain vehicle-related and contact information entered by the user may be processed in order to create the QR code. This processing may involve temporary transmission of data to Mobile-TAG’s servers solely for the purpose of generating the QR code.

Mobile-TAG does not use this data for any other purpose. The data is not stored after the QR code has been generated and is not shared with third parties. The app does not request or allow the entry of personal identification numbers.

Analytics: 
We use Cloudflare Web Analytics to measure website traffic. This analytics solution does not use cookies or track users across websites.

Contact:
If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: [suport@mobiletag-auto.com]
appAutomatic: “The app handles all languages, settings and technical details automatically in the background – you just need to fill in your information. The rest happens in a few minutes.
shortInfo: Mobile-TAG is especially useful in situations where language differences make communication difficult. The app supports many languages and helps drivers organize incident information in a clear and simple way. Mobile-TAG is designed as a practical note-taking tool for drivers.
incidentScenario: Imagine drivers from different countries being involved in a minor traffic incident. Language differences can make documentation difficult. With Mobile-TAG, each driver can enter information in their own language, while the document is prepared in the appropriate language associated with the vehicle. The original text is always preserved for clarity.
notConfesionInfo: Mobile-TAG is a tool designed to help drivers exchange and organize information after a traffic-related incident. It does not replace official reports or any procedures required by authorities or insurance companies.
documentConfesion: The document created by Mobile-TAG does not represent an admission of fault or liability. Its purpose is to summarize factual information as entered by the user about the incident.
helpsFast: Mobile-TAG helps drivers collect and organize important information quickly after a traffic incident, even when language barriers exist. The generated document can be shared as a reference when communicating with other parties. The app does not replace existing procedures and is intended as a supportive tool.
appDevInfo: Mobile-TAG has been developed to support drivers in situations where language differences or stress make documentation more difficult.
standardServiceInfo: When the standard service is used, automatic translation of user-entered text is not applied.
benefitApp: By helping drivers document minor incidents more efficiently, Mobile-TAG can contribute to clearer communication at the scene. This may help reduce unnecessary delays in simple situations.
defaultLanguage: The document is created in English by default. If the vehicle’s country of registration is supported, the app may select the corresponding language automatically.
safeDocument: Reports created with Mobile-TAG are protected with a password to help reduce the risk of unintended access. The password is based on information provided by the user and is intended for convenience rather than strong security.
testAppInfo: If you want to explore how Mobile-TAG works, you can test the app without entering any contact details for third parties. This allows you to familiarize yourself with the features before using the app in a real situation.
MobileTAGTest: Mobile-TAG can feel like real magic – try it once and you’ll see how effortlessly it solves a stressful situation.
importantInfo: Please note: In case of serious accidents involving personal injuries, significant damage affecting traffic safety, or any potential danger, emergency services must be contacted immediately. This application is not intended for such situations. Mobile-TAG is designed for minor damages, helping drivers resolve the situation quickly and efficiently on site.
restrictionText:
Some Mobile-TAG features may be restricted or unavailable in specific countries or regions.
These limitations are usually caused by local regulations or political tensions and are unfortunately outside our control.
priceText: Mobile-TAG is free to use for everyone. Advanced features like Mobile-TAG-Auto cost only about 1 euro and are valid for around 2 hours. This ensures that you only pay when you really need the service – no subscriptions, no hidden costs.
priceInfo: Mobile-TAG is financed by advertising revenue via ads and partly by in-app purchases, this makes it possible for Mobile-TAG to be free for everyone except for the Mobile-TAG-Auto service.
insuranceText: Insurance companies typically require a clear summary of what happened. Reports created with Mobile-TAG can be shared via email as a structured PDF containing the information entered by the drivers.
insuranceTextInfo:
Mobile-TAG helps drivers organize and summarize information about a minor traffic incident in a clear and consistent way. The report structure is designed to make the information easy to read and understand, regardless of the language used.

The document reflects the information provided by the user and is not a claim form, legal document, or assessment of responsibility. Mobile-TAG does not replace any insurance systems and does not perform any evaluation of the incident.

Why password protection and encryption?
The report can be password protected to reduce the risk of unauthorized access if it is shared or sent to the wrong recipient.
insuranceTextClaim: The application does not assess responsibility or liability. Its sole purpose is to help drivers collect and organize information about an incident for their own reference or communication.
usersText: Mobile-TAG can be used by drivers regardless of language. The app helps present the same information in a clear and understandable way for all involved parties. Drivers are responsible for ensuring that they comply with local laws and regulations.
usersTextInfo:
Mobile-TAG is designed to support drivers in a stressful situation by making it easier to record and organize information about a minor traffic incident. The app focuses on simplicity and clarity, allowing drivers to complete their documentation quickly.

The information entered in the app is stored locally on the user’s device and is not saved in any central database or shared with third parties. Reports created with Mobile-TAG reflect the information provided by the user and are generated as read-only documents for reference and sharing.

Any information exchanged between drivers is handled within the app, and users remain in control of their own data. It is the user’s responsibility to manage, share, or delete reports according to their own needs.
securityText: All communication in the app is encrypted in transit. Reports are stored only on the user's device until they are sent, and no sensitive information is shared with third parties.
docProtectionText: Reports created with Mobile-TAG are always protected with a password. The app automatically applies password protection to the document to help reduce the risk of unintended access if the file is shared or sent to the wrong recipient.
truthText: All information entered in Mobile-TAG is provided by the user. Users are encouraged to describe the incident as accurately and clearly as possible. Mobile-TAG does not verify, validate, or assess the information entered.
whyList: Saves time and helps reduce misunderstandings
Helps organize and share incident information clearly
Supports multiple languages for better understanding
companiesIntro: Accidents are stressful and unexpected situations that no one wants to experience. Mobile-TAG helps drivers and companies handle minor incidents quickly and in a structured way. The app is free to use, and with built-in multilingual support, documentation can be completed in just a few minutes — even when drivers do not speak the same language. Make things easier for your drivers by generating Mobile-TAG QR codes for your vehicles and helping ensure that incident details can be recorded efficiently.
rentalText: Place a unique QR code generated with Mobile-TAG in each vehicle (for example under the sun visor). When the driver scans the code in the Mobile-TAG app, vehicle-related information can be filled in automatically. The driver can then complete a password-protected report in minutes, without struggling with paperwork or language barriers.
qrText: Here you can generate a unique QR code for each vehicle. By entering basic vehicle-related information, a QR code can be created, downloaded, and printed. The QR code can be placed inside the vehicle so that drivers can scan it with the Mobile-TAG app if an incident occurs. This helps make it easier to access and record relevant vehicle information without manual entry. This feature is free to use and may be helpful for private vehicle owners, rental companies, leasing fleets, and logistics operators. Fields marked in red are required. Please ensure that the information entered is accurate.
qrMessage:
The document generated by Mobile-TAG is protected with
 a simple password to help reduce the risk of unintended access.
qrMessageTip: QR codes generated with Mobile-TAG are intended to be scanned directly inside the Mobile-TAG application. Because the code contains structured and protected vehicle information, it may appear unreadable or unclear when scanned with a standard QR scanner. This helps ensure that the information is loaded correctly into the Mobile-TAG incident document.
benefitsList: Free to use for drivers and companies
Helps drivers record incident information quickly in stressful situations
Multilingual support helps improve understanding between involved parties
Password-protected reports for added privacy when sharing documents
Clear and structured incident summaries that are easy to communicate
Improved experience for rental and fleet customers during unexpected incidents
mobiAuto:
Mobile-TAG-Auto is designed to help drivers document minor traffic incidents when language differences make communication difficult. The feature allows drivers to read and write in their own language while the app prepares the same document in the official language associated with the vehicle’s country of registration.

Mobile-TAG currently supports over 50 languages and works automatically without requiring users to change device settings or make manual configurations. The original text entered by the driver is always preserved alongside any translated text for clarity.

When multiple vehicles from different countries are involved, Mobile-TAG-Auto can help ensure that each party receives the document in the appropriate language. If the feature is not activated, the document is still created, but without translation of the drivers’ descriptions.

Mobile-TAG-Auto is optional and intended for situations where language differences would otherwise make documentation more difficult.
mobiAutoVersionUpdates: Mobile-TAG supports almost all European languages, and more language packs may be added through updates.
aboutInfoText:
Being involved in a traffic incident is often a stressful experience. Confusion, frustration, and uncertainty are common, and many drivers simply want the situation to be over as quickly as possible. At the same time, important details need to be noted — something that becomes more difficult when no paper is available or when the drivers do not share a common language.

In such situations, contacting an insurance company immediately is not always practical. Phone lines may be busy, online services may require logins, and help may not be available during evenings or weekends. This can add to the stress at an already difficult moment.

Mobile-TAG is designed to help drivers organize and record incident information directly on their mobile device. Within a few minutes, drivers can summarize what happened in a clear and structured way, allowing them to leave the scene calmly and review or share the information later when needed.

The app does not replace official reports, insurance systems, or required procedures. Instead, it acts as a supportive note-taking tool that helps drivers capture factual details during an incident — clearly, calmly, and without language barriers.
howWorkstitle: How it works – Technology behind Mobile-TAG
howWorksInfo: Mobile-TAG is designed with a clear and structured flow to help drivers record and share incident information easily and efficiently.
autoTranslateDescription: The app supports multiple languages and can help present the same information in different languages. The original text entered by the user is always included for clarity.
secureDescription: Information exchanged between devices is handled locally and reports can be shared as password-protected documents to help reduce the risk of unintended access.
smartSuncDescription: When two drivers are involved, their devices can exchange the same incident information so that both parties receive matching documents, presented in the appropriate language.
performanceDescription: Mobile-TAG is built natively for both iOS and Android, focusing on responsiveness and stability when drivers need it most.
closing: Mobile-TAG is designed to reduce stress, simplify communication across languages, and help drivers organize incident information quickly and clearly.
contactText: We value your feedback. If you have suggestions for improvements, if the app doesn’t work as expected, or if you simply want to get in touch, please use the form below. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
contactInfoDescribe: Here you can describe your views or wishes.
moreLang: Support for more languages will be added to the site
thisQrService: This service is handled by Mobile-TAG's server
VBownertax: Can the insured get back the value added tax on vehicles?
title: Support our free service
description: Your browser or security software is currently blocking ads. Advertisements make it possible for us to keep Mobile-TAG free for everyone and to continue improving our tools. Please whitelist this website in your Ad-blocker or Antivirus software. Mobile-TAG only displays safe and relevant ads — we do not show any content related to gambling, alcohol, tobacco, religion, or politics. Thank you for supporting an ad-free and responsible internet!
note: Having trouble? Some antivirus programs (e.g. F-Secure, Norton) also block ads. Please whitelist mobiletag-auto.com to continue.
vehicleOwnerId: The vehicle owner's ID or organization number
vehicleOwnersLocation: Location / city of the vehicle owner
vehicleInsuranceCarrierDamage: Does the vehicle have comprehensive insurance that can cover all damages?
vehicleInsuranceGreen: A green card number is not required
vehicleRegistrationCity: If applicable, the city/region where the vehicle is registered
